name: OxyMetaToken
description: Introducing: OxyMetaToken [OMT] A deflationary utility token built on Binance Smart Chain (BEP20). OxyMetaToken is adeptly designed with a unique rewards system and a focus on sustainable long-term growth through our innovative Decentralized Application. Not only is OxyMetaToken building for the future we are building the bridge to help us get there, and we want to bring you along with us. We are all things Metaverse!
